1970 Booker Prize

In the Booker Prize list selected 6 books.

Broadlist has categorized these selections as:

  • Shortlist (6 books)
  • Winners (1 books)

Read more about how Broadlist categorizes lists.

Source: 1970 Booker Prize

Short List

  • Bruno's Dream by Iris Murdoch

  • Eva Trout by Elizabeth Bowen

  • John Brown's Body by A.L. Barker

  • Mrs Eckdorf in O'Neil's Hotel by William Trevor

  • The Conjunction by Terence Wheeler

  • The Elected Member by Bernice Rubens

Winners

  • The Elected Member by Bernice Rubens
